roleset.name: To put a price on something, again

example.text: [A $ 107.03 million offering of Santa Ana Community Redevelopment Agency , Calif. , tax allocation bonds]-1 got off to a slow start and may be repriced *-1 at lower levels today , according to an official with lead underwriter Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp .
example.arg: according to an official with lead underwriter Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp .

roleset.note: Roleset based on wsj-nw instances. Framed by Claire; comparison to price.01
